issues.description: The platelet value from the most recent blood count is mis-extracted as 34 instead of reflecting the text, which states a new platelet value after 2022-04-18 but is concatenated with the date string and not clearly 34.
issues.evidence_snippet: 2022.4.18血常规：PLT:33今日血常规：PLT:342022.5.23起恢复尼拉帕利1#qd。
issues.suggested_fix: Mark the most recent platelet value as Unknown or leave it unparsed instead of PLT:34, since the concatenated string 'PLT:342022.5.23' does not clearly support a value of 34.

issues.description: The flag for platelet 33 is marked as elevated (↑), but thrombocytopenia is implied; 33 should be below normal.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the flag for PLT:33 to '↓' or 'Low' to reflect thrombocytopenia rather than elevation.

issues.description: Same misflagging in the lab history: PLT 33 is labeled as elevated.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the history flag for PLT:33 to '↓' or 'Low'.

issues.description: HRD positivity is documented as a result of hospital gene testing, but not as part of the surgical pathology specimen; representing it under this specimen may be misleading.
issues.suggested_fix: Either move HRD(+) from the pathology specimen molecular section to a separate genomics or genetic testing section, or note that the HRD test was from separate hospital gene testing, not necessarily this pathology specimen.

issues.description: The analyte is labeled generically as 'Other' despite the text specifying platelet count (PLT).
issues.suggested_fix: Change analyte from 'Other' to 'Platelet count' or 'PLT' to be specific.

validator.content: {"issues":[{"severity":"major","field_path":"TIMELINE.events[13].key_result","description":"The platelet value from the most recent blood routine is misinterpreted as 34 based on the concatenated string.","evidence_snippet":"2022.4.18血常规：PLT:33今日血常规：PLT:342022.5.23起恢复尼拉帕利1#qd。","suggested_fix":"Set key_result to reflect that the most recent PLT value is 342 (platelets 342×10^9/L) and correct the value text accordingly, e.g., \"PLT:342\" instead of \"PLT:34\"."},{"severity":"major","field_path":"LAB_TRENDS.labs[0].latest.flag","description":"Thrombocytopenia (low platelets) is incorrectly flagged as high (↑).","evidence_snippet":"2022.4.18血常规：PLT:33","suggested_fix":"Change the flag for PLT:33 to \"↓\" (low) or an equivalent indicator of decreased value."},{"severity":"major","field_path":"LAB_TRENDS.labs[0].history[0].flag","description":"Historical platelet result PLT:33 is also incorrectly flagged as high (↑).","evidence_snippet":"2022.4.18血常规：PLT:33","suggested_fix":"Change the flag for this historical PLT:33 value to \"↓\" (low) or an equivalent indicator of decreased value."},{"severity":"minor","field_path":"LAB_TRENDS.labs[0].latest.value","description":"The lab analyte value stores the entire string \"PLT:33\" instead of the numeric platelet count, which may hinder numeric trend analysis.","evidence_snippet":"2022.4.18血常规：PLT:33","suggested_fix":"Store the numeric component (e.g., \"33\") in value and, if needed, move the label \"PLT\" to the analyte field or a separate label field."}]}

issues.description: The platelet value from the most recent blood routine is misinterpreted as 34 based on the concatenated string.
issues.evidence_snippet: 2022.4.18血常规：PLT:33今日血常规：PLT:342022.5.23起恢复尼拉帕利1#qd。
issues.suggested_fix: Set key_result to reflect that the most recent PLT value is 342 (platelets 342×10^9/L) and correct the value text accordingly, e.g., "PLT:342" instead of "PLT:34".

issues.description: Thrombocytopenia (low platelets) is incorrectly flagged as high (↑).
issues.suggested_fix: Change the flag for PLT:33 to "↓" (low) or an equivalent indicator of decreased value.

issues.description: Historical platelet result PLT:33 is also incorrectly flagged as high (↑).
issues.suggested_fix: Change the flag for this historical PLT:33 value to "↓" (low) or an equivalent indicator of decreased value.

issues.description: The lab analyte value stores the entire string "PLT:33" instead of the numeric platelet count, which may hinder numeric trend analysis.
issues.suggested_fix: Store the numeric component (e.g., "33") in value and, if needed, move the label "PLT" to the analyte field or a separate label field.

final_issues.description: The platelet value from the most recent blood count is mis-parsed; the source text does not state PLT 34 and the characters "PLT:342022.5.23起恢复" likely belong to PLT 34 followed immediately by a date string, but the exact value is not clearly separated.
final_issues.evidence_snippet: "2022.4.18血常规：PLT:33今日血常规：PLT:342022.5.23起恢复尼拉帕利1#qd。"
final_issues.suggested_fix: Mark the recent platelet result as unknown or leave unstructured rather than asserting "PLT:34"; e.g., set key_result to "Recent platelet count reported but numeric value not clearly parseable from text" and do not give a specific numeric PLT value.

final_issues.description: The latest lab entry uses 2022-04-18 as the date, but the narrative indicates there is a later platelet result on an unspecified later date (“今日血常规：PLT:34…”).
final_issues.suggested_fix: If only one dated value is reliable, keep 2022-04-18 as a historical value but do not label it as the "latest"; either remove the "latest" block or clarify that later platelet value/date are unknown.

final_issues.description: HRD positivity is represented as part of the surgical pathology specimen, but the text attributes HRD(+) to a separate hospital genetic test result rather than the resection pathology itself.
final_issues.suggested_fix: Move HRD(+) from the pathology specimen molecular section to a separate genomics/genetic testing section (already present under CASE_CORE.GENOMICS) and omit it from PATHOLOGY.specimens[0].molecular, or annotate that it is from a separate gene test rather than tissue pathology if such linkage is retained.

final_issues.evidence_snippet: "2022.4.18血常规：PLT:33今日血常规：PLT:342022.5.23起恢复尼拉帕利1#qd。"

final_issues.suggested_fix: If only one dated value is reliable, keep 2022-04-18 as a historical value but do not label it as the "latest"; either remove the "latest" block or clarify that later platelet value/date are unknown.
